  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_81320</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_81320</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Carte de l'Amérique du sud et de l'Afrique</string>
            <string language="en">Map of South America and Africa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karte von Südamerika und von Afrika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapa de Ámérica do Sul e de África</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma del Sudamerica e dell'Africa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτης της Νότιας Αμερικής και της Αφρικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Correspondencia de Suramérica y de África</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">C'est une carte de l'Amérique du sud et de  l'Afrique. Des évidences  telles que les roches anciennes du précambrien, chaîne de montagnes et fossiles de reptiles de fossile trouvées sur les deux continents montrent qu'à un moment ces deux continents n'en faisaient qu'un.</string>
            <string language="en">This is a map of South America and Africa. Evidence such as the ancient pre-Cambrian rocks, mountain chain and fossil reptiles found in both continent show that they were once together.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">l'Afrique</string>
            <string language="en">Africa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roches précambriennes anciennes</string>
            <string language="en">ancient pre-Cambrian rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fossile de reptile</string>
            <string language="en">fossil reptile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">carte</string>
            <string language="en">Map</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">chaîne de montagnes</string>
            <string language="en">mountain chain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Amérique du sud</string>
            <string language="en">South America</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Karte von Südamerika und von 
Afrika. Beweis wie die alten Präkambriumfelsen, Gebirgskette 
und Fossilreptilien fand in beiden continent Erscheinen, daß sie 
einmal zusammen waren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um mapa de Ámérica do Sul e de África.
A evidência tal como as rochas antigas da pré-cambriano, 
corrente da montanha e répteis do fossil encontrou nos ambos a mostra
continent que eram uma vez junto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un programma del Sudamerica e 
dell'Africa. La prova quali le roccie antiche di precambriano, 
catena della montagna e rettili del fossile ha trovato in entrambi 
l'esposizione continent che erano una volta insieme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένας χάρτης της Νότιας Αμερικής και της 
Αφρικής. Τα στοιχεία όπως οι αρχαίοι pre-Cambrian 
βράχοι, η αλυσίδα βουνών και τα απολιθωμένα ερπετά που 
βρίσκονται και στην δύο ήπειρο δείχνουν ότι ήταν μιά φορά από
κοινού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una correspondencia de Suramérica y de 
África. La evidencia tal como las rocas antiguas del 
precámbrico, encadenamiento de la montaña y los reptiles del fósil 
encontró en ambos la demostración continente que eran una vez 
juntas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Afrika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">alte Präkambriumfelsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">versteinertes Reptil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebirgskette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Südamerika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">África</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rochas antigas da pré-cambriano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">réptil fossil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrente da montanha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ámérica do Sul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Africa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">roccie antiche di precambriano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rettile fossile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">catena della montagna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Sudamerica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφρική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχαίοι pre-Cambrian βράχοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απολιθωμένο ερπετό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αλυσίδα βουνών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">África</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rocas antiguas del precámbrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reptil fósil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Correspondencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">encadenamiento de la montaña</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Suramérica</string>
          </keyword>
